event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair action to replace the XSCFU_C.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: An XSCFU_C is either not present or could not be detected during powerup.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
An XSCFU_C is either not present or could not be detected during powerup.
XSCFU failover is disabled.
The recommended service action for this event is to schedule the replacement of the XSCFU_C.
Step 1. Collect the Fault Message (two methods)
Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:
Dec 13 06:08:44 san-dc3-2-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.15, CSN: 2010643002 EVENT-ID: 3f2e17b7-20e0-4190-ad1b-58f3716b05cf Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8008-C9 for detailed information.
Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:
MSG-ID: SCF-8008-C9, TYPE: upset, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Major EVENT-TIME: Thu Dec 13 06:08:44 PST 2007 PLATFORM: SPARC Enterprise M9000, CSN: 2010643002, HOSTNAME: san-dc3-2-0 SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.15 EVENT-ID: 3f2e17b7-20e0-4190-ad1b-58f3716b05cf DESC: An XSCFU_C is either not present or could not be detected during powerup. Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8008-C9 for more information. AUTO-RESPONSE: Nothing is deconfigured. IMPACT: XSCFU failover is disabled. REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair action to replace the XSCFU_C.
Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u Event-ID' command
SPARC Enterprise platform example:
xscf> fmdump -v -u 3f2e17b7-20e0-4190-ad1b-58f3716b05cf
TIME UUID MSG-ID Dec 13 06:08:44.3810 3f2e17b7-20e0-4190-ad1b-58f3716b05cf SCF-8008-C9 100% upset.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.config.xscfu_c
Problem in: hc:///chassis=0 Affects: - FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC Enterprise M9000:chassis-id=2010643002: server-id=san-dc3-2-0/component=CHASSIS Location: CHASSIS
Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
response
title
event_registry_properties.item: An XSCFU_C is either not present or could not be detected.
